title: Google Nexus 8 tablet could be in the works after all | Trusted Reviews
description: ![nexus 9]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * Well the name is a dead giveaway for a start. As with previous Nexus devices,the Nexus 8 – if it exists – will land with an 8-inch (-ish) screen.The benchmark readout also gives us some clues as to what we can expect fromthe device.For instance, it’s listed as using an octa-core processor clocked at 1.3GHz.Unfortunately, we don’t know which exact chip features.The device is also seemingly running on [Android5.1.1](https://www.trustedreviews.com/opinions/android-5-1-features), howeverwe’d say it’s far more likely that a new Nexus tablet will actually ship with[Android 6.0 Marshmallow](https://www.trustedreviews.com/opinions/android-m-features).That’s Google’s upcoming update to its mobile operating system, expected todebut on new Nexus devices this autumn.**Related:[Best Tablet 2015](https://www.trustedreviews.com/best-tablets_round-up)**There’s little else we can extract from this latest leak, so we’ll just haveto wait for an official unveiling from Google.If the Nexus 8 does exist, it’s likely to land alongside the long-rumoured [LGNexus 5 (2015)](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/lg-nexus-5-2015-release-date-rumours-news-specs-and-price) and [Huawei Nexus 6(2015)](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/huawei-nexus-6-2015-release-date-rumours-news-specs-price).Would you like to see an 8-inch tablet from Google? Tell us why in thecomments.**Check out our smartphone group test video below:**
